item.title: Roblox: Mistypeak Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
There are lots of great Roblox experiences and Mistypeak is probably one of the most exciting games. It allows you to become a fairy and fight against other players. There are many different powers that you can choose from, and if you want to become stronger, you will need to use all the resources available. In this guide, we will tell you about Mistypeak codes that you can redeem to get various rewards.

All Mistypeak Codes

Working Mistypeak Codes

  • eternalsunshine – Gives you 1,200 Runes.
  • whooshairrevamp – Gives you 1,500 Runes.

Expired Mistypeak Codes

  • Bloodbending
  • Sokkagurl
  • yayhey17k
  • vampireslay
  • summersun16
  • summerontwt
  • cowgirlbaddieslay
  • foggymountain
  • patlovesbts
  • omgslay12k
  • mistypeakingat12k
  • spookyseason23
  • spacedayslay
  • pigsarenotcool11k
  • ty11klikes
  • marchlikegoal1yay
  • 10klikesparttwooo
  • 10kLikesTHANKYOU
  • FebRunesCode2
  • FebRunesCode
  • JanuaryRunesCode1
  • RunesCodeYay
  • birthdaybash2023
  • HappyNewYear
  • happyholidays22
  • mistytrading
  • winterparttwo
  • mistypeakwinter

Runes in Mistypeak are a very important resource that allows you to purchase various items. With their help, you can get new weapons from the Blacksmith or various cosmetics to customize your Fairy. You can buy many things from different NPCs, and if you want to have all of them, you will need to use every opportunity to get more resources.

You should definitely redeem all available codes and get your free Runes as quickly as possible. Otherwise, they will expire, and you will fall behind the players who have claimed these bonuses.

How to Redeem Mistypeak Codes

Mistypeak allows you to get various free bonuses by redeeming promo codes. This process works the same as in other Roblox games and requires you to open a special menu. Here is a list of steps that will help you redeem codes and get your rewards in Mistypeak :

  • Launch Mistypeak . Wait for this Roblox experience to load.
  • If you play for the first time, create your character.
  • After that, complete the tutorial.
  • Once you are at the spawn location, look at the left side of your screen.
  • There will be a part of the interface that shows you how many Runes you have. Also, there is a Gift icon next to it.
  • Click on this Gift icon and you will open a menu.
  • Type the code you want to redeem.
  • Hit Enter.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Mistypeak Codes

If the developers release new Roblox codes, we will add them to this guide. So, you can bookmark the article and check it regularly for new bonuses. Also, you can follow the official Mistypeak social media pages:

  • X Account
  • Discord Server

item.title: Soul Knight Prequel Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Soul Knight Prequel Codes
  • Soul Knight Prequel: How to Redeem Codes

Soul Knight Prequel is an immersive fantasy game that takes you back to medieval times where you have to fight against a bunch of enemies and bosses. You can realize any of your dreams by playing as the desired class, such as a paladin, a powerful sorcerer, or many others, as the choices are vast. Surviving in this world is not easy, but with Soul Knight Prequel codes, you can make your progression process easier. By redeeming the codes, you will receive many useful rewards, ranging from fragments to good weapons and armor.

Updated September 12, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Currently, only two active codes are available. Check back in a while to get more freebies.

All Soul Knight Prequel Codes

Going into battle without equipment and supplies is a terrible idea because you will simply get killed. Instead, you will need to gradually develop your character to master skills and find new weapons. The developers are generous and have provided the opportunity to redeem codes that are often posted in official sources, so you can get cool rewards just by following them, or by visiting this site sporadically to find all the active ones immediately.

Active Codes

  • THX4ALLGP - Redeem this code to get Captain Paloma’s skin, 3x Gale Juice, 3x Housing Snapshots, 3x Bullion, Tempest Juice, and Life Juice.
  • ASTHX4ALL - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Expired Codes

  • DAILYFREEBIE - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • YULEBALL - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • 2024NEWYEAR - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • HAPPYDAY - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Soul Knight Prequel: How to Redeem Codes

Before you can redeem the codes, you'll need to complete a short tutorial to learn the mechanics of the game. When you do, don't rush into battle, but rather get free rewards from the codes. Here's how to do it:

  • Go to the Chapterhouse, the base location where you can rest after your adventures.
  • Next, move to the left side of the location, where you will find a lake and a house with a red tile roof.
  • To the left of the house, you'll notice a mailbox, so you should approach it and interact with it.
  • After doing so, you will open a new menu showing the contents of your inventory, the amount of currency you have, and the letters you have received.
  • On the left side of the screen, you will also notice two icons, one of which looks like a key in an envelope.
  • Interact with this icon, and you will be taken to another tab where you will see an input field and a green checkmark button.
  • Enter the code manually, or copy it into the input field, and then click on the green button to get the rewards.

Repeat these steps with all active codes to collect all rewards. Remember that the codes have a limited expiration date and the developers will not wait for you to redeem them, so hurry up.

Soul Knight Prequel is available on PC, Android, and iOS.

item.title: Sneak out Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Sneak out is a great way to spend a few evenings with friends. The game's concept is reminiscent of Dead by Daylight because it also features a maniac and a bunch of desperate people who must do everything to survive. They must complete mini-quests to open a portal and escape. Even if you're unlucky enough to get caught by the killer, you can play as a ghost and interfere with the killer in every way possible, so your allies have time to escape. Despite the concept, this game is suitable even for children because it is drawn in an excellent cartoon style, so even the skeletons here do not look creepy but rather funny.

Sneak out has plenty of interesting characters and skins, but you will need a lot of time to unlock them, unless you redeem Sneak out codes and get free game currency and other bonuses.

Updated September 12, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Unfortunately, only one code is available at the moment. We are constantly monitoring for updates, so you can save this article and come back later.

All Sneak out Codes

Working Sneak out Codes

  • W4So4yC0d3 - Enter this code to get 2,000 Crystals, 24-Hour +50% Coins Boost, and Special Border.

Expired Sneak out Codes

There are currently no expired codes for Sneak out .

In Sneak out , you can get coins and crystals during the game. Characters can only be bought with crystals. By redeeming the code, you will get a lot of crystals, and therefore, you will be able to buy a new character faster and a coin booster that will help you get some customization items faster.

How to Redeem Codes in Sneak out

In mobile games, it's usually easy to redeem codes, but Sneak out is a PC and console game, so it's not surprising that the way to redeem codes is different. Although everything is quite simple, players often need a hint, so we have created a guide to explain how to redeem codes in Sneak out :

  • Launch Sneak out .
  • Select your region.
  • To the right of the sleeping area, next to the hives, there is a device which says Claim code. Go to it and hold E.
  • In the field, paste a code from our list of working codes and click Claim.

Once you have redeemed the code, you will not receive any notification of rewards. At the same time, the Claim button only works if the code you entered is correct.

How to Get More Sneak out Codes

Just like with other free PC games, we regularly update our codes page, so you can bookmark it in your browser to be the first to receive information about freebies. You can also find codes on the social media pages of the Sneak out developers:

  • Kinguin Discord channel
  • Sneak Out X page
  • Sneak Out Facebook page

Sneak out is available on PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo.

item.title: PS Plus: A Comprehensive List Of Every Monthly Game It's Added
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Free Games PS Plus Essential: September 2024
  • All Monthly Games That Were Free On PS Plus Essential
  • All Games That Were Added To PS Plus Extra
  • All Classic Games That Were Added To PS Plus Premium

Sony launched the new era of PlayStation Plus in June 2022, combining the previous version with PS Now. Although the latter subscription service was around for a long time, PS Now struggled to get over its early negative reputation, so a revamp was needed to wipe the slate clean.

PS Plus is split into three tiers: Essential , Extra , and Premium . Essential unlocks PlayStation's online features along with providing a couple of free monthly games. Along with Essential's offerings, Extra grants access to hundreds of PS5 and PS4 games; meanwhile, Premium extends the lineup to include older consoles. Each month, Sony adds a bunch of new PS Plus games to each tier, including first-party exclusives, third-party juggernauts, and indie darlings. Some months are better than others, but they all tend to include a couple of standouts. What are all the monthly games that have been added to PS Plus?

Updated September 12, 2024 by Mark Sammut: The PS Plus Extra and Premium games for September 2024 have been added.

Free Games PS Plus Essential: September 2024

Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions (PS5/PS4), MLB The Show 24 (PS5/PS4), & Little Nightmares 2 (PS5/PS4)

The PS Plus free games for September 2024 are an eclectic bunch with one huge surprise. In a very rare move for Sony's subscription service, a Day One release was announced for Essential's September lineup: Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions . The Wizarding World's key sport has received a modern adaptation courtesy of Unbroken Studios and Warner Bros. Games, with the project very much looking to adapt the fictional activity so it works as a more traditional entry in the genre. As with the source material, players can step into four roles, each of which has very specific responsibilities within matches. While Seekers tend to decide matches in Harry Potter , they are just a part of the puzzle in Quidditch Champions and far from the only deciding factor.

Subscribers who prefer their sports without flying brooms can check out MLB The Show 24 , the latest entry in the default baseball franchise of the last decade. MLB The Show has been producing gold for a long time, and the latest entry is no exception despite garnering slightly less overwhelming praise than some of its predecessors. With deep gameplay and modes, this project can be life-consuming if someone allows it to be.

So, sports games are September 2024's theme, and both options focus on multiplayer quite extensively. However, the month does not completely ignore everyone else either, as the final freebie is Little Nightmares 2 . Tarsier's platformer series delivers creepy visuals, solid puzzles, complex lore, and fantastic enemy designs. Little Nightmares 2 is quite short, making it perfect to play over a weekend in between longer games.

All Monthly Games That Were Free On PS Plus Essential

  • 1- Month Price: $9.99
  • 3-Month Price : $24.99
  • 12-Month Price: $79.99

Formerly known as just PS Plus, Essential is the minimum required to play online multiplayer on the PS5 or PS4. Every month, the tier rotates a couple of new free PS Plus games . While these titles are only available to purchase for roughly a month, anyone who picks them up can continue to play them after that point as long as they have an active subscription.

All Games That Were Added To PS Plus Extra

Current: September 2024 PS Plus Extra (Starting From September 17)

  • 1-Month Price: $14.99
  • 3-Month Price : $39.99
  • 12-Month Price: $134.99

PS Plus Extra is the first tier that includes a catalog featuring hundreds of games. Extra focuses exclusively on PS5 and PS4 titles, with each month expanding the existing library with roughly 10 to 20 new additions. Unlike Essential, PS Plus Extra's games are available indefinitely, although some could be removed after spending a few months on the service.

The September 2024 PS Plus Extra new games might attract a mixed reception from subscribers, especially when compared to the month's departures; however, the lineup has a few exciting titles. The Plucky Squire is, obviously, the headline act, mainly due to being a Day One arrival. These types of releases are starting to become more common, but they are hardly a guarantee. While not a huge name, The Plucky Squire should offer a whimsical mix of 2D and 3D platforming and action.

Anyone craving story-driven adventures with memorable characters should check out Night in the Woods and Road 96 . Both games are fantastic in their own right, and they each have strong visual identities. Far Cry 5 also has a fun story, although it is mostly worth playing if someone is fond of the open-world Ubisoft formula. Chernobylite is a welcome addition to PS Plus' horror lineup.

Overall, September 2024 will not go down as an all-time great month for PS Plus Extra, largely due to lacking any huge names outside of (maybe) The Plucky Squire . Still, the included projects are good additions to the service's library.

All Classic Games That Were Added To PS Plus Premium

Current: September 2024 PS Plus Premium (Starting From September 17)

  • 1-Month Price: $17.99/month
  • 3-Month Price : $49.99
  • 12-Month Price: $159.99

PS Plus Premium includes everything available on Sony's service. Along with Essential and Extra's games and benefits, this tier includes a classic catalog of PS3, PS2, PS1, and PSP games, along with some PS4 remasters. Premium's monthly additions have been inconsistent so far, and it is not unusual for a month to go by with barely any classic additions to the tier.

Although most lineups contain only a handful of classics, PS Plus Premium has been steadily enhancing its old-school library, particularly when it comes to PSP and PS1 releases. The games might not all be bona fide masterpieces, but the selection covers both well-known and obscure properties. Starting from June 2024, Sony has begun to add PS VR2 games to PS Plus Premium.

The September 2024 Premium lineup is small but strong. Pistol Whip is a brilliant addition to the Plus' PS VR2 lineup; in fact, an argument could be made that it is the best virtual reality game on the service. While only a small percentage of subscribers have the necessary hardware to run the title, anyone who does should definitely try Pistol Whip .

When it comes to PS Plus Premium classic games , the month's selection blends the safe with the weird. Secret Agent Clank is a decent PSP spin-off game that builds nicely on the Ratchet and Clank formula. Meanwhile, Mister Mosquito is a celebration of the bizarre, the type of project that nowadays would only be developed by an indie studio. Sky Gunner is a combat flight sim that seems to have been mostly forgotten over the last two decades.

PS VR 2

item.title: Shell Shockers Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Shell Shockers is a browser-based online shooter where you and all the other players will be eggs competing against each other using different firearms. The game has a variety of weapons to choose from, so no matter your playstyle, you'll definitely find something for you. The only drawback is that it's quite difficult to stand out from other players if you don't have unique skins that you can equip. Most of these skins in the game cost real money, but by redeeming Shell Shockers codes, you can get them for free, so be sure to take advantage of this to stand out from the crowd.

Updated September 12, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This article has been updated to include new codes and check old ones. If you don't want to miss a new freebie, you should bookmark this article and come back in a while.

All Shell Shockers Codes

To look Eggcelent and unique on the battlefield, you'll need to get skins. As mentioned above, all of them are paid, but if you don't want to spend real money, you can use Shell Shockers codes that developers share from time to time.

Active Codes

  • 5831 - Redeem this code to see how EGG ORG was defeated.
  • D3LL0RKC1R - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Expired Codes

  • 3MIE3441J66
  • CHEESY PEAS
  • freedelivery
  • inapurplehaze
  • kensentme
  • noescape
  • norealguns
  • RATTY RAT RATTY

How to Redeem Codes in Shell Shockers

Redeeming Shell Shockers Codes is not difficult and the whole process will take you a few seconds. There is no tutorial in the game, so you will be able to redeem codes as soon as you open the site. If you've never redeemed codes before or have forgotten how to do it, here are detailed instructions:

  • Open Shell Shockers .
  • When you open the site, you will be taken to the main page. Here, pay attention to the left side of the screen, where there are various buttons.
  • Among these buttons, find and interact with the one that says Inventory.
  • After opening the inventory, pay attention to the lower-right corner of the screen. There will be a Redeem Code button. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu with an input field, a red Cancel button, and a green Confirm button.
  • Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Next, click on the green Confirm button to submit your reward request.
  • If you do everything correctly, you will see a notification about the rewards you have received.

You will need to redeem all the codes to get all the possible rewards. Once you receive the skins, you can equip them in the Inventory tab.

Shell Shockers is available on PC and mobile.
